name: Patrick, and What Happened To Him
name_original: Patrick, and What Happened To Him
description:
a very short story about an incredibly uncomfortable day of high school. please enjoy, or whatever one does with something like this

tw// sexual assault, discussions about murder and suicide. peruse at your own discretion

made by inu, over the course of a very dull week, in the midst of working on other projects (that will be finished eventually). didn't check this on windows; hopefully this works
